alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Northern Jasper; Southern Jasper; Tyler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 11:53AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Tyler, northern Hardin and eastern Jasper Counties through 1230 PM CDT... At 1153 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kirbyville to Thicket. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Woodville, Kirbyville, Kountze, Fred, Wildwood, Warren, Town Bluff, Thicket, Caney Head, Votaw, Honey Island, Magnolia Springs, Mt. Union, Spurger, Village Mills, Ivanhoe and Hillister. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Hardin; Northern Jasper; Southern Jasper; Tyler
